name: Sky Snake Scat Saga
description:
Sky Snake Scat Saga

An ancient flying dragon is awaken from his slumber by human waste flooding into his lagoon ands vows revenge on high density housing. By shitting on it.

That's right, you didn't expect that twist - the Snake is a NIMBY! You are in fact playing the villain of this piece. You thought the snake was pure and their desire to shit on things came from their environmental concerns? 

Maybe this game is an allegory for a supposedly leftist councilor in a city near you who got voted in with the backing of your countries Green party? A councilor who then turned around and voted against high density zoning laws for no real good reason. 

Or maybe you're reading too much into this and it's just a gameplay idea I toyed around with that didn't really have legs. Thanks for playing this metagame 'is all art inherently political' that I shoehorned into the description.

i don't know what the floating sky apples are supposed to represent.

Controls

Arrow keys to change facing

Space to poop

Don't hit the edges of the screens or the buildings

Longer snake and pooping on taller buildings score more points

Esc to pause
